product_name: Rafters Breeze Flip-Flops - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: Rafters Breeze Flip-Flops for women are perfect for the beach. Their simple style lends a sporty and casual look, while a durable rubber outsole keeps each step stable. Contoured footbeds have arch support for comfort. Made with a 2-piece, zero-glue construction. Durable, soft, tightly woven uppers. Women's Rafters Breeze Flip-Flops have lightweight, superior bounce for all-day comfort. Special buy.
